docs.snippet: When a colleague asked Margee Ensign to help her sister who had been snatched by Boko Haram from her school dormitory in Chibok and escaped, the president of the American University of Nigeria could not refuse....

docs.snippet: At 15, Veronica Lopez knew death. Ultimately it caught up with her on a Chicago roadway....
docs.lead_paragraph: At 15, Veronica Lopez knew death. Ultimately it caught up with her on a Chicago roadway.
docs.abstract: Friends and family continue to mourn Veronica Lopez, who at age 15 was youngest of six people killed in gunfire in Chicago over Memorial Day weekend; ninth grader became victim despite her mother's ongoing attempt to escape gang violence (Series: Murder in Chicago).

headline.main: A Mother Tried to Escape Gangs. Bullets Found Her Daughter.
headline.print_headline: A Mother Tried to Escape Gangs. Bullets Found Her Daughter.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN and CATRIN EINHORN
